content.description: This session will give you an overview of the different serverless technologies available today on the Azure platform. Introducing when and how to use Azure Functions, Logic Apps and Container Instances.

content.event: SRE Topics: Are majority of Engineering Teams doomed to mediocrity?
content.description: According to DevOps Research & Assessment (DORA) report, elite teams get code to users 100x faster than the bottom half of teams, deploy 46x more frequently, and restore service from incidents in 2666x less time! Is this a skill gap (spoiler: NO), a technical problem, or a business one? Most importantly, how can you help your team function at an elite level?

content.event: Managing dependencies for AWS Lambda functions with Eric Johnson
content.description: In this session, I demonstrate how to structure an application to share dependencies across all Lambda functions in the same application. I also demonstrate using AWS Lambda layers to further abstract dependency management and share code across single applications or multiple applications shared across the globe.

ServerlessDays Stockholm is a developer-oriented conference about serverless technologies. We believe in and encourage practical sessions, in which developers share their experience and lessons from real-world projects. This time with an all Nordics speaker line-up.

A 4-week introduction to running containers on AWS taught by AWS Container Hero Vlad Ionescu. Running Containers on AWS will teach you everything you need to know to start running containers using Docker, Fargate and Kubernetes.
11 January 2021 - 5 February 2021
£400, €450, $520

Start with an introduction into Lambda, introducing foundational concepts, moving onto API security, testing strategies, CI/CD, secret management, and finishing with operational best practices.
